basics.name: Uzair Shamim
basics.summary: I am a hardworking individual capable of figuring out problems on my own when it is required of me. I also enjoy working in teams as it allows me to have my ideas critisized and improved on by others, and gives me the opportunity to do the same.

highlights: Created a new user experience (C#, SQL, JS) for how users setup states for activities in Brightspace
Created a code search tool with JavaScript, Roslyn and OmniSharp for visualizations of usages of functions in C# code as trees
Worked on a UI initiative to simplify the user experience of Brightspace
Helped create, modify and improve Polymer and LitElement web components
Worked on APIs built using C# and backed with MSSQL
Helped create a language management system for admins to customize language terms
Wrote code for filesystem layer to use AWS S3 (C#)
Refactored legacy code to meet new development standards
Writing a testing tool to perform large amounts of operations on the new filesystem and compare to the legacy file system to verify correctness
Developed React application and tested with Jest, Enzyme, Cypress, and React Storybook
Developed website with AngularJS, Karma, Protractor/Selenium and Jasmine
Built a scalable chat application using Docker, React, Java, NodeJS, WebSockets, and Apache Kafka
Created RESTful Java 8 services and APIs using Spring with a tiered architecture (web service, service and domain layers)
Used Dynatrace to troubleshoot performance issues in web applications
Built, deployed and released applications using Atlassian Bamboo
Developed database for tracking graduate students and faculty/curriculum resources.
Maintainer of Saka, a chrome extension for improving the browsing experience
Written using Preact, tested with Jest and the dom-testing-library
Collaborate with contributors and users to fix bugs and add features
Discuss topics like software development and testing
Document how to use libraries/programs I find interesting (eg. dom-testing-library)

courses: In a team of 3, built a podcast feed in Qt that could fetch and play episodes from a podcast on iTunes
Wrote a program in Qt that uses stenography to embed messages inside of images
Applied software design patterns to code and analyzed design patterns in a project (JHotDraw)
Created a website using JQuery and Perl that allows booking and cancellation of seats on a train with arbitrary amount of seats
